abstract: Iranian deputy foreign minister Hassan Qashqavi says Iran is not planning prison swap with United States for Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian, imprisoned since July 2014; Rezaian's lawyer expects verdict on espionage charges soon.
lead_paragraph: Iran has no plans to trade Jason Rezaian, the imprisoned Washington Post correspondent, for any Iranian citizens held by the United States.

headline.main: Iran: Official Denies Any Plan to Trade U.S. Reporter
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Official Denies Any Plan to Trade U.S. Reporter

snippet: Iran has no plans to trade Jason Rezaian, the imprisoned Washington Post correspondent, for any Iranian citizens held by the United States.
